short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show email deliverability information on top bar and provide bird view information of the Salesforce org configuration

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides email deliverability information on top bar for the Salesforce org. If the email deliverability is set to all emails(accidently) in staging sandbox it flashes the message.

This extension will also provide bird view information of Salesforce configuration in next releases.

/****************************************************************************/
Release Notes
/****************************************************************************/
Version 2(15/12/2024)
- Added Full fledged app with org limits

Version 1.2(20/07/2024)
- Removed animation that was capturing unnecessory attention

Version 1.1(18/12/2023)
- Fix issue related to message showing in Production environment
- Updated the tile location to open complete app
